events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it promptly.
Your application has been categorized under the software engineering role based on your submitted resume and skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application and guide you through the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully to assess your background, technical skills, and motivation for the developer position.
We received the candidate's prompt and enthusiastic response confirming availability for the next stages of the interview process.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team to evaluate your coding and problem-solving abilities.
You have completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong skills and knowledge relevant to the software developer position.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and your career aspirations within the company.
The HR interview was successfully completed, and both parties expressed mutual interest in proceeding with the offer.
An offer for the software engineer position has been proposed, detailing compensation, benefits, and start date options.
We have received positive feedback from the candidate expressing excitement about the offer and eagerness to join the company.
The candidate has officially accepted the offer for the software engineering role, confirming their commitment to join the team.
The onboarding process has started, including setup of accounts, access to tools, and introduction to the engineering team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the new software engineer fully integrated into the company.
